name: WatchFamily
description: The game "WatchFamily" is a mini game that satirizes the image of our ordinary young man who wants to take the time of his own by avoiding the eyes of the family who watches over and over.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compliant Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 Compliant Graphics Card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 100 MB available space
